00015 using boost::shared_ptr;

00017 using namespace kumonosu;

00019 void*
00020 runServer(void *arg)
00021 {
00022     TSimpleServer *server;
00023     server = (TSimpleServer *) arg;
00024     server->serve();
00025 }
00026 
00027 void
00028 RemoteServerTest::constructorTest()
00029 {
00030     // Set up the server so the client has something to talk to
00031     int port = 9090;
00032     pthread_t serverThread;
00033     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00034     shared_ptr<RemoteRequestManagerHandler> handler(new RemoteRequestManagerHandler(queue));
00035     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new RemoteRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00036     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(port));
00037     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory(new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00038     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00039 
00040     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(processor,
00041                                               transport,
00042                                               transportFactory,
00043                                               protocolFactory);
00044     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00045     sleep(1);
00046     RemoteServer* server = new RemoteServer("localhost", 9090);
00047     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(server != NULL);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void
00051 RemoteServerTest::sendRequestTest()
00052 {
00053     int port = 9191;
00054     pthread_t serverThread;
00055     RequestQueue* queue = new RequestQueue();
00056     shared_ptr<RemoteRequestManagerHandler> handler(new RemoteRequestManagerHandler(queue));
00057     shared_ptr<TProcessor> processor(new RemoteRequestManagerProcessor(handler));
00058     shared_ptr<TServerTransport> transport(new TServerSocket(port));
00059     shared_ptr<TTransportFactory> transportFactory(new TBufferedTransportFactory());
00060     shared_ptr<TProtocolFactory> protocolFactory(new TBinaryProtocolFactory());
00061 
00062     TSimpleServer *testServer = new TSimpleServer(processor,
00063                                               transport,
00064                                               transportFactory,
00065                                               protocolFactory);
00066     pthread_create(&serverThread, NULL, runServer, (void*) testServer);
00067     sleep(1);
00068     RemoteServer* server = new RemoteServer("localhost", 9191);
00069     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(server != NULL);
00070 
00071     int32_t serviceId = 1;
00072     queueItem item;
00073     item.methodId = 2;
00074     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(server->sendRequest(serviceId, item));
00075 }
